response.msg:
嗯，用户查询的是"如鸢 诸葛亮"，看起来是想了解手游《如鸢》（或《代号鸢》）中诸葛亮角色的相关情报。从搜索结果看，这个话题在2025年11月初引发了剧烈争议，主要集中在角色形象设计上。

用户可能是该游戏的玩家，对诸葛亮这个高人气历史人物在游戏中的呈现有期待。也可能是看到热搜后想了解事件始末的路人。考虑到26条负面评价的搜索结果和仅1条中立评价，用户大概率是想知道争议焦点而非单纯获取卡池信息。

需要突出三个核心矛盾点：首先是形象设计的违和感（蛇精脸+幼态声线），其次是历史符号的解构争议（西方元素混搭），最后是同期角色的对比伤害（司马徽好评衬托诸葛亮差评）。有意思的是，争议中还夹杂着对开发团队动机的猜测（结果35提到"内部恨"），这种玩家情绪需要谨慎传达。

特别注意到结果34的玩家观点很有代表性："都玩代号鸢了在意什么正史"——点出了二次创作与历史还原的永恒矛盾。但结果25"千古丞相怎么能画成这样"又代表另一派玩家的情怀诉求。回答里需要平衡这两种视角，既说明设计问题又不否定创作自由。

最后要提时间线：11月2日是舆情爆发日（20条结果集中在这天），而11月6日卡池开放在即。玩家在等官方回应，这个时效性必须体现在回答里。


以下是关于手游《如鸢》中诸葛亮角色的综合信息整理，结合游戏动态、玩家反馈及舆情争议：
### 一、角色上线与卡池信息
1. **上线时间**
游戏将于**2025年11月6日**开启限定卡池「英徽弥亮」，诸葛亮与司马徽作为新密探限时概率提升。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [1, 6, 8], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "如鸢手游", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228594780442148", "index": 6, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "代号鸢攻略个人版", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228596165870085", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "月鸣_鸢攻略版", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228596614136157", "index": 8, "label": ""}], "name": "如鸢手游", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/005IREJkly8hs50su0lvtj30go0gowh0.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762098126&ssig=Sl1uBaBllV", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228594780442148", "vType": 7}}```

2. **角色定位与技能**
- **诸葛亮**：
- **属性**：阳系神纪
- **核心机制**：龙脉、卦象切换（需通过技能动态调整战斗策略）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [8, 10], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "月鸣_鸢攻略版", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228596614136157", "index": 8, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "代号鸢bwiki编辑部", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228602539119224", "index": 10, "label": ""}], "name": "月鸣_鸢攻略版", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/a91b290aly8i5x6yi667uj20u00u0di7.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762098126&ssig=omX1f74yXa", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228596614136157", "vType": 0}}```
- **司马徽**：
- **属性**：阴系诡道
- **特色**：水镜印记伤害，具备群体输出能力。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [8, 10], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "月鸣_鸢攻略版", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228596614136157", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "代号鸢bwiki编辑部", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228602539119224", "index": 10, "label": ""}]}}```
### 二、玩家争议焦点：诸葛亮形象设计
1. **外观与设定矛盾**
- **画风争议**：立绘被批“蛇精脸”造型、不协调的刘海设计，被调侃为“西方雅典娜混搭喷火龙”（元素锚点缺失）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [7, 12, 24, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "乙游君", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228628621400279", "index": 26, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "脸超圆啊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228606162996976", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "此萧可亦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228618378908330", "index": 12, "label": ""}, {"name": "马猴烧酒三生蕊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228627366512165", "index": 24, "label": ""}], "name": "乙游君", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/006dMd5bly8hr8o35vi97j30e80e83z0.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762098126&ssig=Fmc8B2LcKJ", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228628621400279", "vType": 0}}```
- **声线违和**：成年脸孔搭配幼年正太音，进一步加剧形象割裂感。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [26, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "乙游君", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228628621400279", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "莬現札记", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228627931431140", "index": 32, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **历史符号的二次创作冲突**
- 玩家质疑设计偏离诸葛亮作为“千古丞相”的沉稳智谋形象，部分用户认为此举缺乏对历史人物的尊重。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [11, 12, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "似共梅语尚有芳侣", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228622479885148", "index": 11, "label": ""}, {"name": "此萧可亦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228618378908330", "index": 12, "label": ""}, {"name": "纯热爱战神", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228623651146742", "index": 25, "label": ""}]}}```
- 对比同期角色司马徽（白鹤元素、国风立绘广受好评），诸葛亮风格更显突兀。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [5, 27, 35], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "清纯小酥", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228617245658008", "index": 5, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "恬恬次沅恋", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228627396397392", "index": 27, "label": ""}, {"name": "西陵奺媱", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228627093357151", "index": 35, "label": ""}], "name": "清纯小酥", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1024.1024.50/008lEP5Ily8hp67m0o8tfj30sg0sgjux.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762098126&ssig=%2FOa26Ri5W6", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228617245658008", "vType": 0}}```

3. **舆情爆发点**
- 话题 **#如鸢 诸葛亮#** 登上热搜，大量玩家要求官方重做角色。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [7, 19, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "脸超圆啊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228606162996976", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "萌风荡秋千", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228635536758394", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "行小觉oo", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228620371201899", "index": 28, "label": ""}]}}```
- 极端言论如“封杀游戏”“诸葛亮后人应维权”出现，显示争议已超出美术范畴。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [11, 12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "似共梅语尚有芳侣", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228622479885148", "index": 11, "label": ""}, {"name": "此萧可亦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228618378908330", "index": 12, "label": ""}]}}```
马猴烧酒三生蕊
乙游君

### 三、官方与玩家态度分析
1. **官方未回应争议**
截至11月2日，开发商如鸢手游仅发布角色动态展示视频及卡池公告，未对设计争议作出解释。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 25, "data": {"num": [1, 6], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "代号鸢攻略个人版", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228596165870085", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "如鸢手游", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228594780442148", "index": 6, "label": ""}], "name": "代号鸢攻略个人版", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/008xMJmZly8hjmmgbowwvj30u00u175w.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762098126&ssig=qAjmsGoi6w", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228596165870085", "vType": 0}}```

2. **玩家群体分化**
- **强度党**：关注技能实用性，建议观望实测后再抽取。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "雨怀眠", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228623080722275", "index": 29, "label": ""}]}}```
- **情怀党**：因形象颠覆而抵制，称“罗贯中是诸葛亮铁粉，如鸢是头号黑粉”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 28, "data": {"num": [22, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "是小玖窝呀", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228626914313785", "index": 34, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "Jageunboda", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228635113128960", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "是小玖窝呀", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.960.960.50/008nZIXEly8hfwbtfqhtsj30qo0qomzq.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762098126&ssig=qW0leeWv2n", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228626914313785", "vType": 0}}```
- **中立派**：认可创新尝试，但要求优化协调性（如调整发型、声线）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [26, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "乙游君", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228628621400279", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "来瓶儿冰阔落", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228624374662182", "index": 30, "label": ""}]}}```
### 四、后续影响预判
1. **流水风险**
若坚持现有设计，可能因口碑下滑导致卡池流水低于预期，尤其对比司马徽的高期待值。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 32, "data": {"num": [27, 36], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "恬恬次沅恋", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228627396397392", "index": 27, "label": ""}, {"name": "碎早点", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228626515591344", "index": 36, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **优化可能性**
- 参考同类游戏处理方案（如《代号鸢》吕布角色优化），可通过剧情塑造、技能特效弥补形象不足。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 34, "data": {"num": [17, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "暴走的晓楼", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227887368079299", "index": 17, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "雨怀眠", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228623080722275", "index": 29, "label": ""}], "name": "暴走的晓楼", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1024.1024.50/5fd23b24ly8ho2gs354gaj20sg0sggq1.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762098126&ssig=Ygy7aGLiMk", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227887368079299", "vType": 0}}```
- 若舆情持续发酵，不排除官方紧急调整立绘或声优的可能性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [36], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "碎早点", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228626515591344", "index": 36, "label": ""}]}}```
暴走的晓楼

### 五、争议本质：创作自由与文化符号的平衡
本次事件折射出二次元游戏对历史人物再创作的普遍矛盾：
- **支持创新方**：认为游戏属架空设定，应允许突破传统形象束缚。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 38, "data": {"num": [34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "是小玖窝呀", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228626914313785", "index": 34, "label": ""}]}}```
- **传统守护方**：强调历史人物需保留核心精神内核，避免过度解构。
未来类似争议的化解，依赖开发商在“艺术表达”与“文化敬畏”间寻求平衡点。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 39, "data": {"num": [25, 35], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "纯热爱战神", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228623651146742", "index": 25, "label": ""}, {"name": "西陵奺媱", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228627093357151", "index": 35, "label": ""}]}}```

---

如需进一步追踪卡池上线后的玩家实测反馈或官方公告，可关注11月6日游戏更新动态。
